moves.name: Water Gun
moves.description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

moves.name: Tail Whip
moves.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

moves.name: Mud Sport
moves.description: The user covers itself with mud. It weakens Electric-type moves while the user is in the battle.

moves.name: Mud Shot
moves.description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. It also reduces the target's Speed.

moves.name: Slam
moves.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, etc., to inflict damage.

moves.name: Mud Bomb
moves.description: The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack. It may also lower the target's accuracy.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Yawn
moves.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Muddy Water
moves.description: The user attacks by shooting muddy water at the opposing team. It may also lower the targets' accuracy.
